# JOB EXPECTATIONS ## Atmospheric Technician
The Atmospheric Technician is primarily responsible for setting up atmospheric distrobution and waste filtering.
## Do - Ensure a livable atmosphere is maintained. - Ensure gas leaks are properly managed and sent to waste. - Restore safe atmospheric conditions after a spacing event. - Ensure the station's air temperature is maintained.
## Don't - Put anything other than oxygen and nitrogen into distribution. - Huff Frezon.
